data.oai_dc:dc: Present checklist contains data on 156 moss species, located in the natural landscape on the territory of the core area of the Prioksko-Terrasnyi biosphere reserve (Russian Federation, South of Moscow region) 4960 ha. This area includes the left bank of the Oka river, on the border of the boreal and nemoral forests and dry meadows. The list is compiled based on over 10 years of observations of flora and actual for the period 1980-1990.
